page.title: 07Coming to Live in Wales.
page.content: I used to live in Bristol and we wanted to move to the country . We did not have a nice neighbouhood so mum and dad wanted a place in Wales.We saw a nice bungalow in Troed y Rhiw, Cribyn. It is much quieter than Bristol. When I moved I found that there was not as many children to play with and I wished that I was back in Bristol. Some of my friends speak Welsh and I speak a little now. There are many things to do here like fishing, walking, bird watching. The school is small but just as many things go on here. In the country there are planes flying over all the time and make such a noise that they annoy people and animals.
